title: What is the name of the actress in Yo Yo Honey Singh's new single 'Loca'? - Quora

response.answer_text: The girl's name in yo yo Honey Singh's hit song loca is Nicky picky. Loca song has crossed 100m views on YouTube. In an interview Honey singh said that his team took one month to select the model, he also appreciated her hard work and told he loved her dance moves which she learnt in a shot span of time. The female vocals of the song is sung by simar kaur and music and rest of the part by Yo Yo Honey Singh.
